You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesW W] > &wscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Wscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4B2.
  * `&wscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4CC.
